name: Unrushed Defence
description:
The spirits of the forest are the most unknown and very powerful elements. If they don't like something, it's better to run. So it was for many centuries. But today, we will stand against this previously invincible force and show what humanity is capable of by organizing the Unrushed Defense!

Unrushed Defense - 2D tower defense strategy. Manage your castle, build any defensive towers would you like, upgrade them or sell them, fight off waves of different enemies at the first opportunity and conquer all the lands! Prove to all the evil spirits of this forest the indestructibility and purity of your noble goal!

Game Features:
- 5 levels
- Many types of enemies and towers
- Pixel Art
